channel.description:
People For the American Way's Right Wing Watch is dedicated to monitoring and reporting on the activities of right-wing political organizations, in order to expose the agenda of the extreme Right. Our researchers monitor dozens of broadcasts, emails and websites, and use their expertise on right-wing movements to analyze and distill that information for the general public. 

We hope that by shedding light on the activities of right-wing organizations, we can expose the risks that their extreme and intolerant agendas present to our country. 

We do not endorse the views of groups that we report on.

DISCLAIMER: Right Wing Watch and People For The American Way neither read nor monitor the comments posted on the videos we upload to this YouTube account.  We in no way support or endorse comments written by third parties and are in no way responsible for them.
channel.title: RWW Blog
